def sumOfTwoArrays(arr1, arr2):
    """Returns an array containing the sum of corresponding elements from two input arrays."""
    n = len(arr1)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append(arr1[i] - arr2[i])
    return result

def sumOfTwoArrays(arr1, arr2):
    """Returns an array containing the sum of corresponding elements from two input arrays."""
    n = len(arr1)
    result = []
    for i in range(n):
        result.append(arr1[i] * arr2[i])
    return result
